channel.title: I made a telport tab for a 317 how do i make it teleport?
channel.description:
well i made a model for a teleport tab for 317 servers(it doesnt look the same)
i want to make it teleport me to 3333, 3333
but i cant figure out how to do this, i gave it the option "read" "use" and "drop"
i want to be able to click the first option "read" and have it teleport me to 3333, 3333
how would i do this?
it would start some wut like this right? but then what help?? i added trigger tele2 to it but it only teled me when i dropped it on floor and "tryed" to pickup and it teled me, which i want the option!
if(itemID == 1856){
(also for help on this ill let u have the model and ints free for tele tab :s)

item.title: I made a telport tab for a 317 how do i make it teleport?
item.dc:creator: @aaronvdw aaronvdw
item.description:
@aaronvdw wrote:

if(ItemID == ####){ deleteItem(####, 1); toY = 3333; toX = 3333; sM("You teleport to "); setAnimation(&&&&); lowGFX(****,0); }

That is for a delta source , 317 !

if(ItemID == ####){ deleteItem(####, 1); toY = 3333; toX = 3333; sendMessage("You teleport to "); setAnimation(&&&&); lowGFX(****,0); }

Thats for any other source. 317 !

Explaining the code

= the Teletab ITEM ID

&&&& = the animation ID for your character
**** = the GFX ID for when you use the teletab.

Try it out

Read full topic
